text_content.title: Help us grow & grow with us

header.title: Who is a Traildeer Ambassador?
header.descr: At Traildeer we're all about bringing bikers together riding their favourite trails wherever these trails are. As we want to bring exciting bike experiences to as many riders as possible as fast as possible we're looking for local ambassadors that can help us grow faster and further via their bike network at home.

steps.text: Sign up new guides and riders by introducing Traildeer to your network off- and online.
Helping us find a way to specific people, institutions or resorts in the MTB industry.
Supporting interested guides and riders in the sign up process by helping them through it.
Creating your own content to support the expansion and brand reputation.
Provide insights for our marketing campaigns to make them more attractive in the specific market.
Collecting feedback from the local guides and riders and sharing it with the team.

text_content.title: ...anything else that would help spread the word faster

reviews_sec_header.title: Our Ambassador Team
reviews_sec_header.descr: Become part of an ambassador influencer team and learn from each other how to do it even better

header.title: What is in it for you?
header.descr: We greatly value the support an Ambassador can provide us and therefore we aim to compensate you for a job well done throughout the life of our cooperation and beyond.

badges.title: Monthly income
badges.descr: Get some extra cash on top of all the benefits every month

badges.title: Build your reputation
badges.descr: The more we grow the more your reputation will thrive

badges.title: Sign up new guides
badges.descr: Earn a percentage from every tour of a guide you help us sign up

badges.title: Grow with us
badges.descr: We're spreading like wildfire and the more we grow the more your reputation will grow

badges.title: Product Discounts
badges.descr: As an ambassador you ride with any guide or coach on the platform with a significant discount

badges.title: Get Featured
badges.descr: Featuring your offer/s on our platform in our featured section and our social media regularly

badges.title: Low Booking Fee
badges.descr: If you're a guide, coach or a vacation operator we will cut our booking fee's for all your tours by half

badges.title: Join a Community
badges.descr: Join the online and offline ambassador community with top riders from around the world

badges.title: Exclusive Events
badges.descr: Our ambassador community will enjoy invite-only unique rides with great guests and  trainings

text_content.title: Are you our ideal Ambassador?
text_content.descr: Are you "just" a passionate rider or a bike professional? If you are well-connected on or offline and have a good amount of influence in the local market we should to talk. We are looking for general ambassadors, and also riders in specific categories like e-MTB, gravel, XC, DH or Enduro

header.title: Qui est ambassadeur Traildeer ?
header.descr: Chez Traildeer, notre objectif est de rassembler les participants sur leurs sentiers pr√©f√©r√©s, o√π qu'ils soient. Nous voulons proposer des exp√©riences v√©lo inoubliables au plus grand nombre, le plus rapidement possible ; nous cherchons donc des ambassadeurs locaux qui peuvent nous aider √† nous d√©velopper plus vite et plus loin via leur r√©seau.
